mean_cn: adj. 老于世故的，成熟的，（仪器）精密的，繁复的，精致的
mean_en: having or showing a lot of experience and knowledge about the world and about culture, art, literature, etc.
word_etyma: soph智慧+istic...的+at＝ate做，造成+ed...的→ 老于世故的；精致复杂的
sentence: This woman has a highly sophisticated appearance.
sentence_trans: 这个女人的面容相当精致。
